meanings.definition: A short episode of a television show or series that is released on the internet.
meanings.sent1: I watched a webisode of my favorite show online.
meanings.sent2: The webisode was only ten minutes long.
meanings.sent3: The webisode made me laugh with its funny storyline.
meanings.sent4: The webisode was like a mini-movie on my computer screen.
meanings.sent5: The webisode had me hooked from the start.

meanings.definition: A segment of a web series that is typically shorter in length than a traditional television episode.
meanings.sent1: Have you seen the latest webisode of that online series?
meanings.sent2: The webisode was a quick watch during my break.
meanings.sent3: The webisode had a surprising plot twist at the end.
meanings.sent4: The webisode was a bite-sized dose of entertainment.
meanings.sent5: The webisode left me wanting more episodes to watch.
